articles.headline: aXcelerate - AusRAIL 2026
articles.summary: aXcelerate manages over 2.8 million enrolments annually and launched aXcelerate Skills for high-risk industries like rail, mining, and emergency services to manage workforce competency.

articles.headline: Release Notes 2026
articles.summary: 2026 releases include organisation notes with email logs and editable organisations on enrolments to improve client portal functionality.

articles.headline: Key Announcements, Innovations and Updates | 2025
articles.summary: aXcelerate Day 2025 with 400+ attendees from 170+ organisations announced WCAG compliance, new workshop interface, enrolment expansions, next-gen LMS, aXcelerate Skills launch, aXcelerate Academy, biggest event yet.

articles.headline: Release Notes - 2025
articles.summary: 2025 releases include payments in Learner Onboarding, QLD Fee-Free TAFE support, API enhancements, and new Learner Onboarding feature to streamline enrolments and improve completion rates.

articles.headline: Lead the way under the 2025 Standards for RTOs
articles.summary: Improvements to Learner Onboarding with payments and links, new Client Portal for tracking progress and enrolments, open beta mobile app with Offline Assessments, and automated certificates to manage more learners efficiently.

articles.headline: aXcelerate Day 2023 – Your questions answered
articles.summary: aXcelerate Day 2023 event featured insightful questions and responses on Learner Portal, SCORM support, onboarding upgrades, and AI for feedback and customer service, indicating product innovation and development focus.

articles.headline: Release Notes - 2023
articles.summary: 2023 updates include LinkedIn certificate sharing, agreements transfer with enrolments, assessment performance improvements, and enhanced billing visibility.
